Submodules¶

indic_aug.globals module¶

indic_aug.globals.path2lang(path)[source]¶

Returns language code from extension of path.

Parameters

path (str) – File whose language code is to be extracted. Note that the file must have extension as language code, for example, train.en for English. Refer LANGS below for language codes.

Returns

Language code.

Return type

str
